regen.absent_element: access control for grade information to ensure privacy
regen.new_specification: The system shall restrict access to grade details, averages, and overall scores to relevant users only.
The system shall ensure that grade details, averages, and overall scores are only accessible to authorized users.

regen.absent_element: ensure privacy for grade details, averages, and overall scores
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that grade details, averages, and overall scores are only accessible to relevant users.

label: No other actor should be able to view another one's grades except the course administrator.
absence: no mention of prohibiting anyone other than administrators from viewing others' grades
